00277 class FCDConversionFunctor
00278 {
00279 public:
00280     FCDConversionFunctor() {} 
00281     virtual ~FCDConversionFunctor() {} 
00282     virtual float operator() (float v) = 0; 
00283 };
00284 
00286 class FCDConversionScaleFunctor : public FCDConversionFunctor
00287 {
00288 private:
00289     float scaleFactor;
00290 
00291 public:
00292     FCDConversionScaleFunctor(float factor) { scaleFactor = factor; } 
00293     void SetScaleFactor(float factor) { scaleFactor = factor; } 
00294     virtual ~FCDConversionScaleFunctor() {} 
00295     virtual void SetScale(float v) { scaleFactor = v; }
00296     virtual float operator() (float v) { return v * scaleFactor; } 
00297     virtual FMVector3 operator() (FMVector3 v) { return v * scaleFactor; } 
00298     virtual FMVector4 operator() (FMVector4 v) { return v * scaleFactor; } 
00299 };
00300 
00302 class FCDConversionOffsetFunctor : public FCDConversionFunctor
00303 {
00304 private:
00305     float offset;
00306 
00307 public:
00308     FCDConversionOffsetFunctor(float _offset) { offset = _offset; } 
00309     virtual ~FCDConversionOffsetFunctor() {} 
00310     virtual float operator() (float v) { return v + offset; } 
00311 };
